title: Will America vote for a messiah leader?
abstract: In this article Simon Western describes four key leadership frames or discourses, one of which is the Messiah discourse. Simon Western poses the question, will America vote for a Messiah leader? Offering insights into Barack Obama and Hillary Clintons’ leadership styles, the article discusses the impact they have on the subconscious hopes and fears of voters
